definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: Offenses with this characteristic usually will be encountered as assimilative crimes.
sentences.chinese: 帶有此特徵的犯罪行爲通常將視爲同等犯罪。

sentences.english: Fourth, the failure is beyond the unit's will.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪行爲未達既遂是由於單位意志以外的原因。

sentences.english: The judge said that nothing could mitigate the cruelty with which the mother had treated her child.
sentences.chinese: 法官說，這位母親虐待孩子，罪行無法減輕。

sentences.english: The most insignificant transgression reverberated in the most ethereal worlds.
sentences.chinese: 最微不足道的罪行在最超越塵俗的天地裏引起迴響。

sentences.english: We hope you repent for your crimes in the past, too.
sentences.chinese: 我們也希望你們能爲過去所犯的罪行懺悔“。

sentences.english: The judge found him guilty of unpardonable evil.
sentences.chinese: 法官認定他的罪行十惡不赦。

sentences.english: The worst guilt is to accept an unearned guilt.
sentences.chinese: 最嚴重的罪行是接受一個不勞而獲的罪行。

sentences.english: The worst guilt is to accept an unearned guilt.
sentences.chinese: 最嚴重的罪行是接受一個不勞而獲的罪行。

sentences.english: His crime escaped detection for many years.
sentences.chinese: 他的罪行許多年都未被發覺。

sentences.english: Shixian and Wuji get the news and plan to expose Yingming's misdeed.
sentences.chinese: 世賢和戊己得到消息，準備揭發英明的罪行。

sentences.english: The law prefers to let off for one's past wrongdoings.
sentences.chinese: 法律有時寧願放過一個人過去的罪行。

sentences.english: Whatever you've done couldn't atone for the misdeeds.
sentences.chinese: 無論你做什麼，都不能彌補過去的罪行。

sentences.english: Yeah. I am interested in, I was interested in how different companies committed fraud
sentences.chinese: 好的。我感興趣的是，公司如何犯下欺詐罪行，

sentences.english: The police caught him and he made a clean breast of his crime.
sentences.chinese: 警察抓住了他，他坦白交代了他的罪行。

sentences.english: Islam does not permit this sort of barbaric crime.
sentences.chinese: 伊斯蘭教不允許這樣的野蠻罪行。

definition: so many that the bamboo slats have been exhausted/innumerable crimes (idiom)/see also 罄筆難書|罄笔难书[qing4 bi3 nan2 shu1]
